metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15923 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
Konversation 1.4.x, 1.5.x, 1.6.x, and 1.7.x before 1.7.3 allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via vectors related to parsing of IRC color formatting codes.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15923` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

konversation - 1.6-0ubuntu1.1
konversation-data - 1.6-0ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: konversation package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6-0ubuntu1.1').
